item.description:
Planet Zydeco

VFW Hall
295 Arsenal Street (the VFW across from the Lexus dealer)
Watertown, MA

Suggested Contribution: $18

SPECIAL OFFER: New people/dancers - 1/2 Price (Full price $18.00 - 1/2 price $9.00). Regulars - encourage your friends - bring new friends - bring your co-workers - bring your mother-in-law - bring your neighbors - and how 'bout that guy you met on the subway.....

Doors open at 6:00 PM
FREE Zydeco dance lesson from 6:30 until 7:15pm

Music starts at 7:30 pm until 10:30pm
item.name: Dance to Planet Zydeco
